required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of a Natural Product, Containing Nanovesicles From Citrus Limon (L.) Juice, on Different CV Risk Factors
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of the Natural Supplement CitraVes Containing Nanovesicles Delivered From Citrus Limon (L.) Juice on Cardio-metabolic Risk Factors in Subjects With Metabolic Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical trial about beneficial effects of natural supplement in a spray-dried formulation, citraVes™, obtained from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on general body health.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is one randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study. The aim of the present study is to investigate the role of a natural product, citraVes™ on several cardiovascular risk factors.
The research hypothesis is to evaluate whether this natural supplement containing nanovesicles delivered from Citrus Limon (L.) juice (Navhetec S.R.L., Palermo, Italy) may improve different cardio-metabolic parameters in subjects with the metabolic syndrome. All subjects will be evaluated at baseline, after 1 month and after 3 and 6 months of supplementation with natural product or placebo.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Plasma Lipids in Healthy Subjects
primary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C), total cholesterol, triglycerides, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C) (mmol/l).

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Plasma Lipids in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
primary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C), total cholesterol, triglycerides, and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C) (mmol/l).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Waist Circumference in Healthy Subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on waist circumference (cm).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Waist Circumference in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on waist circumference (cm).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Body Mass Index (BMI) in Healthy Subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on body weight (kg) and height (m) that will be combined to report BMI in kg/m^2.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Body Mass Index (BMI) in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on body weight (kg) and height (m) that will be combined to report BMI in kg/m^2.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Glycemia in Healthy Subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on plasma glycemia (mmol/l).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Glycemia in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on plasma glycemia (mmol/l).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Glycated Haemoglobin in Healthy Subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on glycated haemoglobin (HbA1c) (%).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Glycated Haemoglobin in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on glycated haemoglobin (HbA1c) (%).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Subclinical Atherosclerosis in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on subclinical atherosclerosis assessed by carotid intima-media thickness (CIMT) (mm).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Plasma Cytokines in Subjects with Metabolic Syndrome
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of natural supplement containing nanovesicles from Citrus Limon (L.) juice on plasma cytokines (inflammatory markers) (pg/ml), that will be assessed using available enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kits.

arm_group.description: 20 subjects with the metabolic syndrome receiving natural supplement containing nanovesicles delivered from Citrus Limon (L.) juice (1000 mg/day)
20 subjects with the metabolic syndrome receiving placebo (without any active ingredients)
20 healthy volunteers receiving natural supplement containing nanovesicles delivered from Citrus Limon (L.) juice (1000 mg/day)

intervention.intervention_name: Natural supplement containing nanovesicles delivered from Citrus Limon (L.) juice_MetS
intervention.description: 20 eligible subjects with the metabolic syndrome (MetS) will take natural supplement containing a spray-dried formulation of citraVes™, directly in the mouth, without water, to be dissolved preferably under the tongue, at a stable dose of one sachet a day (1000 mg/day) for 6 months and as add-on therapy to the ongoing treatment, maintained at fixed doses for the entire study.

20 eligible subjects with the metabolic syndrome will take placebo in a spray-dried formulation (without any active ingredients) directly in the mouth, without water, to be dissolved preferably under the tongue, at a stable dose of one sachet a day for 6 months, as add-on therapy to the ongoing treatment, maintained at fixed doses for the entire study.

intervention.intervention_name: Natural supplement containing nanovesicles delivered from Citrus Limon (L.) juice_HS
intervention.description: 20 eligible healthy subjects (HS) will take natural supplement containing a spray-dried formulation of citraVes™, directly in the mouth, without water, to be dissolved preferably under the tongue, at a stable dose of one sachet a day (1000 mg/day) for 6 months, maintained at fixed doses for the entire study.

overall_official.affiliation: University Hospital of Palermo, Palermo, Italy
